testcase.name: TC13 Yanlis email, dogru password ile giris yapilamamali
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici "myUrl" anasayfaya gider....................................passed Then myCourse cookies butonuna basar........................................passed Then myCourse anasayfa login linkine tiklar.................................passed And myCourse kullanici adi olarak "myYanlisEmail" girer.....................passed And myCourse password olarak "myGecerliPassword" girer......................passed And myCourse login butonuna basar...........................................passed Then myCourse giris yapilamadigini test eder................................passed And Sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed
